course_description: This course focuses on the foundational knowledge of contemporary management of high risk and critically ill neonates/infants up to two years of age. Emphasis includes assessment, developing differential diagnoses, comprehensive care and management across the continuum (acute-critical-chronic care).
prerequisites: NRSG 528 and NRSG 554 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: 3874, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 7:30-8:30p, Instructor: M. Conway-Orgel, Status: Open
